all_reviews.review_title: A great application, one of the best I've used.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
This software allows me to quickly manage all the digital assets of the company, allowing online annotations and making approvals in a timely manner and being able to see the behavior of the clients in real time.
This software is excellent since it also allows me to have the capacity to develop the whole system, using in a simple way all its functionality for the commercial needs of my business. I can create the necessary number of folders to use, I can change the names of certain functions and move things so that the platform is configured according to my needs as a company.
I can say that this software has an interface that at Visual level looks perfect. Intelligence Bank allows us to customize the pages, in order to give our company a sense of belonging. It seems to me to be a very good and almost complete tool, guaranteeing an optimal performance in my business.
This platform is incredibly flexible. You can configure each module quickly and easily for the different departments, granting different permissions, access and folders for each of the employees, if necessary, you can make changes, always with the supervision of the technical support team.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
There are certain small things that I do not like, for example from time to time there is a system error that does not allow us to solve, but once we get in touch with technical support, these are resolved, there are also things that need some research to discover them over time.
Otherwise, I have nothing to say about things that I do not like. Even so, I am very satisfied with this software and its customer service team.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
If you still have doubts, I invite you to review each of the details that this software has and you will surely come up with the ideas of the needs and how you can deal with them with Intelligence Bank, this will undoubtedly be a very useful tool as it is for me and my company, being efficient with it and allowing us to reach the proposed goals.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
This software has allowed me to optimize most of the processes, even IntelligenceBank allows me to know in real time from the comfort of my mobile to know what is in store, and look for it quickly in order to share the information by means of email with the Sales team in case the product has not been touched for sale.
To be able to use this system I can say with property that we have been able to save a lot of time and money simplifying many steps in the processes, we insist that you try Intelligence bank that surely you will not regret.

all_reviews.review_content:

I like how easy it is to bulk upload assets to IntelligenceBank. Just drag and drop! Also the navigation of the site is super easy but modern. I Having a preview of the files live on the site is fantastic so you can see what you're downloading.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Only thing that I don't like is that subfolders are hard to find. It would be nice to see sub folders shown as folders alongside the other assets in the library.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Simple and easy to use. Clean and modern layout. Can be a basic asset management site or implement the print and template side for even more features.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to IntelligenceBank we used Dropbox to share our assets. Now instead of responding to emails such as "do you have..." we can now direct our clients to our asset library and its self serve platform.
Our site can easily be updated and will always have the latest and most up-to-date information.

all_reviews.review_title: New to Intelligence Bank and Enjoying the Experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
As a team who is constantly dealing with a multitude of image assets that are both incoming and outgoing, we needed a solution that would act as a single point of truth to help us effectively organize the volume. What we like best is how Intelligence Bank allows you to search for assets through tags, filters or following our file structure. This is a major time saver and allows us to work smarter and more efficiently.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
The cropping tool, along with the cropping presets are not as intuitive to use as it can be. We wish it would be a more seamless experience as it is such an advantage to have that tool built into a DAM system.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Intelligence Bank has great/patient/understanding customer support from the get-go and in an environment with so much software competition, this has really stood out as their strength.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having one point of truth for all our visual assets that can be accessed by the whole team from multiple departments and by our outside vendors. Intelligence Bank allows scalability and will serve to be a strong resource even as our team grows and evolves.

all_reviews.review_title: An easy solution to manage our mountain of images
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
We chose Intelligence Bank over a bewildering selection of DAM providers worldwide. What we like is the platform's clean and simple interface, the ability to skin the site with our brand and the fact that it is supported in Australia. I've been delighted with the quick, helpful and responsive support from the IB team.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Cost is probably the only small downside for us. I would have liked to purchase all the modules, but we had to choose which ones we could immediately afford. It's great that the platform is scalable 'though - meaning we can add on modules as our budget allows.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Very easy to use and intuitive - great for non-technical people. Excellent local support.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our business deals with visual imagery constantly. It has been very frustrating trying to access images from our server, resizing them so they are fit for purpose and tracking their use. Intelligence Bank solves this issue for us as everything is automated. We love the search function and we love that we can integrate the database with Adobe CC.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
While we are still in the implementation stage, we like that there will be one truth to our files and the ability to easily search through the thousands of files in one place.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
It's too early to say as we are still in the early stages of implementation but from our trial, the cropping tool option is great, but the resize presets are not very intuitive, we can foresee a lot of frustrations within our company.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to Intelligence Bank, we were using Google Drive to store and share our assets. This was problematic as we weren't able to auto tag our assets and had multiple versions of the same file depending on permission settings. This was very time consuming, and had a high risk that people were using the wrong file if a folder was not updated.

all_reviews.review_title: Efficient and flexible
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The flexibility of the platform. We had to set up different permissions, access and folder for different people and most of it could be done. Also, the platform is very intuitive and easy to use or modify in necessary.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
There is nothing I dislike. Sometimes, some of the functionalities we require are not available or are being developed, but then in some cases, it's just a matter of time before can have the functions we need.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Review the product in detail, think about what your needs are and what you need it for. I think a complete brief helps the team to customize the product for your more efficiently.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We want to consolidate all our digital assets in one place and have them available to various stakeholders (internal and external). We also want to have a better classification and control of the assets we have and the platform will help us do that. A nice surprise is that it will also help us reduce some paperwork and connect other platforms to IB which facilitates social media and website administration.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
review_question_answers.answer: The flexibility of the platform. We had to set up different permissions, access and folder for different people and most of it could be done. Also, the platform is very intuitive and easy to use or modify in necessary.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
review_question_answers.answer: There is nothing I dislike. Sometimes, some of the functionalities we require are not available or are being developed, but then in some cases, it's just a matter of time before can have the functions we need.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
review_question_answers.answer: Review the product in detail, think about what your needs are and what you need it for. I think a complete brief helps the team to customize the product for your more efficiently.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We want to consolidate all our digital assets in one place and have them available to various stakeholders (internal and external). A nice surprise is that it will also help us reduce some paperwork and connect other platforms to IB which facilitates social media and website administration.

all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank DAM Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The filterability of the assets is the most helpful aspect of the tool. And the proxy-based folders that prevent needless file duplication.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
The ability to only upload 100 assets at a time, as well as the upload speeds-- although that doesn't really have to do with the DAM itself.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Best to use when storing and organizing assets that are accessed by different departments by different levels of authority at different times. Really helps keep everything together and helps all users find the appropriate assets where things are always moving and changing. Helps admins manage proper access to assets easily.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
More organized structure of assets and streamlined workflow between different departments.

all_reviews.review_title: Sophisticated platform that allows us to manage brand content, guidelines, logos and assets
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
For us, it's fantastic having all things brand on the one platform and is accessible by 33,000+ employees (including Marketing), as well as multiple external agency partners. Features include:
- Brand Hub: where we house all of our guidelines, logos, assets, image library, etc
- Toolbox: where feature a knowledge base to answer those FAQs (and can measure CSAT), plus
- Ask the team: A complex form with conditional fields aimed at resolving requests with a single response which means that no longer use emails
The platform offers insightful reporting and data capability (including dashboards) that allows us to evolve and grow the platform, as we do.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Many of the features that we've implemented have been bespoke solutions. It would be great to leverage more learnings from other organisations, and see more out of the box solutions introduced that can be rolled out quickly.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Intelligence Bank platform provides a one-stop shop for all things Brand that can be accessed by internal employees and external parties. It lets us better manage our assets, and track usage/page visits/downloads, send alerts and keep people informed when changes occur. It also offers detailed reporting options that allow us to evolve and grow our content (and the platform itself).

all_reviews.review_title: Single Location for Branding Control & Product Images
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
I like the fact that we can control our branding message and elements in one place.  Our distributors have access to the latest approved branding elements and product shots, so we don't become the bottleneck when items are needed.  We can also use their custom pages to serve as a way to help users navigate the system while showcasing our branding guidelines at the same time.  These pages can also be updated as necessary.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
New functionality is always been added to meet gaps in the product and the team listen to issues or requests we have.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
If you have a need to control your brand content, ensure your content is being used correctly and showcase your assets, IntelligenceBank is a great solution to look into.  They also have a lot of other capabilities that we are looking to grow within the future, such as dynamic templates and a marketing operations platform.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before IntelligenceBank, we didn't have a way to ensure that the latest product images and brand guidelines were being followed.  Now we know that the assets that are available to our distributors have been approved for use.  It's also important to have an area where our distributors can access the approved brand guidelines so they remain compliant when using our content.  Finally, they no longer have to wait for our team to provide them with the exact elements they need for their needs because they can just access the system any time they need.

all_reviews.review_title: Traffic and Production Manager
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The platform is super intuitive - it's great to have the ability to build out the functionality yourself so that the platform works for your business needs. You can create folders, move things around and re-name them so that the platform is set-up to how you need it.

Visually it looks great. It's great to see our brand come to life on the platform with the brand guideline custom pages. It's a great tool to launch our new brand architecture and provide all the rules around how to work with our brand to ensure consistency across our business.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
There are sometimes limitations around what we've requested however IntelligenceBank will always take on board feedback and look to add these additional features on their road map.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Centralised system to save our brand guidelines and brand assets where our team can self service by downloading the logos, images, icons etc that they need. This has already saved the brand team and our in-house studio loads of time as we no longer need to email/attached assets to the team.

Manage our campaign briefing from start to finish including all our briefs are approved before we even start work. We then have a process for stakeholders to review/approve campaign creative assets before they are dispatched.

all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank Digital Asset Management Software integrates with our online marketing tools
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The IntelligenceBank DAM platform integrates seamlessly with our online marketing tools including our Sitecore CMS and our 3rd party distribution tools.

The best part of using the IntelligenceBank DAM is that now we have one location where all of our 10,000+ employees, press, agencies and partners can go to find the thousands of images, logos and videos for our 80+ hotels and resorts.

Whenever we need a new integration, Digital Asset solution or just have a question on the DAM, the team always go the extra mile to ensure the platform integrates with our tools and our questions are answered. With previous integrations, the communication with our team and other software partners has been outstanding.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I can't think of anything. The team is always very helpful.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
I would absolutely recommend the IntelligenceBank DAM! It is easy to use and the team is great to work with!

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
IntelligenceBank solves four major problems for Two Roads Hospitality.

The platform:
1. Provides a central hub to access, store and download all hotel assets (images, logos, etc.)
2. Allows access controls for specific users or groups in regards to file uploading and sharing
3. Enables self-registration for media outlets/agencies to download assets
4. Integrates with our marketing software, which includes a CMS and specialist hotel marketing software.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect Solution for a Franchise Businesses with Multiple Locations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
We love that we can offer a single, secure location for our franchisees to access the content they need when they need it. We can completely customize the welcome page navigation to highlight the most important content as well as share latest news and approve franchisee-created material.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
There are a few small things that are less intuitive and needed research to figure out, but for the most part, we didn't even read the manual.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
When you choose a platform, make sure it can grow with your needs, and it can mirror the way you work.  That is, make sure the technology can map to your processes, not the other way around.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
With so many locations and franchisees spread around the world, it was almost impossible for us to provide them, in a timely manner, the content that they needed, especially when it came to video or large size imagery. We can now provide an easily accessible place for our franchisees to search for, download, share and preview video and images when they need it, instead of taking time away from multiple people in the organization and slowing down their process.

The way we can set up divisions for our image and asset libraries. We also love the licensing management tool which allow us to keep track of license expiry & renewal dates for our imagery.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?

It has stopped the use of incorrect collateral across international markets. With the platform, we no longer have to worry that staff will repurpose market-specific adverts for other parts of the world.

all_reviews.review_title: A central hub for quickly finding documents and images
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
It is a real pleasure to work with the IntelligenceBank team! Their support is truly exceptional. The rollout of a digital asset management tool was significant for our business. We had several key priorities to address with implementation, and IntelligenceBank's team listened to these needs: ensuring the solution could handle our priorities.

I appreciated the way they never pressured or rushed us during the rollout. At the same time, they were there to answer our random platform questions when required.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Honestly, there wasnt anything, at least so far, that i havent loved.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed an easy to use, central repository for all our files. Our staff were losing a lot of office hours searching for collateral to put into proposals. Often, if the team couldn't find files, they would simply create a new resource, only to find what they needed later on. IntelligenceBank allows our team to quickly find content across documents (Word, PowerPoint & PDF) and images. Its improved the speed at which our team have put together proposals, leading to less duplicate content and ensured a quick place to find out business critical documents.

all_reviews.review_content:

IntelligenceBank has a really intuitive interface and we like the flexibility to not only manage media files such as images and video, but also PDF, excel and word docs.  The audit trail gives you a great level of visibility and you can see how and where files are being used. The last thing to mention is the support we get.  The managers at IntelligenceBank are not only very responsive, they are always looking for ways to help us get the most out of the tool.  It's not set and forget at all - they are always coming up with new ideas for us.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I'd like online editing for collaboration.  An integration with office 365 would be more helpful to us but it's not a deal breaker.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
I've used IntelligenceBank in several roles and companies.  IntelligenceBank not only helps us centralise content but more importantly, it provides a level of accountability and compliance around media and other files.  Without a system in place, you are flying blind.

I especially like how you can use it as a client portal to engage with customers.   It's flexible and over the past couple of years, it has come a long way.  They really listen to customer feedback.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Nothing really. More integrations would be good though

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
I would highly urge folks to consider this solution.  It is flexible and easy to use.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
It takes services like Dropbox and Google drive tot he next level.  It's configurable so you can use it to share creative and client reporting.  At the end of the day - it also makes me more efficient as it keeps track of everything I need to share with customers. It also allows measurement of content usage.

Very customizable user interface. Allows me to create any grouping and subgrouping of categories, or mix and match. I can have assets by clients, project or any other organization method and have several ways or arranging and reorganizing asset. It has aliasing abilities so that files that you would like to show up in several groups aren't requiring a duplication of assets just to maintain organization. I also like the ability to not only download the original "master" asset, but that you can download on-the-fly flattened reference visuals, ie, compressed, cropped, reduced in dimension jpgs, pngs etc...keeping me from having to save a myriad of variants in anticipation of potential needs.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
It would be nice to be able to track outbound communications, notably, a log of elements and groups of elements I have sent, and to whom, and when. I believe I can see the downloading activity of any particular element, but not a way to confirm that I've actually created and sent a link to assets after that action is completed.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
I recommend contacting the company as I did, to find a team receptive to ultra specific, and even out of the mainstream needs. In doing that I discovered a team heavily invested in making this a product for the masses - and could help you create the work flow and asset solution you could have only dreamed of just a couple of years ago.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a designer it allows me to track projects with multiple clients and projects easily. The ability to customize those arrangements makes it easier for me to distribute work product from anywhere - and works on my iPhone and iPad too - so no longer am I scrambling to get back to  a computer when a sudden need for an asset arises. Plus the download speed of assets on the recipient side is among the best I've ever seen.

all_reviews.review_title: Really easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
IntelligenceBank DAM really nails UX design and it's very easy to use.  Our global team love the system, as do our customers and other stakeholders.  I also like how you can start small and grow over time, which has been fantastic for us as a high growth venture.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
We have a lot of data so it would be great if data costs were cheaper, but it's worth it because our files are backed up twice nightly.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Value
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
I am an Adobe CC user and I really like the integration with Adobe Bridge. Being able to add meta data via Bridge is a huge help. Many of our files were previously tagged with information and not having to duplicate that information is huge.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I cant really find anything to dislike. I look forward to the many upgrades that are being worked on. I am in need of a rotation component to file mark-ups. I.B. help desk is now creating one. The help desk is very attentive.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
I have created D.A.M systems and Intelligence Bank has been the easiest and most intuitive. The initial launch can seem intimidating, but once you go through the tutorials it all makes sense. Plus, the Customer service is awesome. I have always received a response with the hour and always helpful.The system works well for creatives who use Adobe CC.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our biggest challenge is creating a single access point for all images that have been created for many years. Being able to create a single repository with existing and new meta data for searching is important. From a single access point we can now catalog over 15 years of images with global changes that dramatically reduce time and efforts. Our IB will also replace using Drop Box. We can now work more efficiently with image annotations  as well as share files more efficiently

all_reviews.review_content:

The way that it can act as a centralised place to store and send product shots.

With Intelligencebank, I can quickly upload product images into the DAM and send off to

reporters for stories, or use images in social media posts. Its great for ensuring DRM.

I can brief our design team using the DAM on ways to Photoshop images to suit our style

and I can educate new staff and freelance writers and designers on the language, look and

feel of our magazine.

Also, Customer service are quick to respond to queries.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Nothing really at all... So far so good!

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving ways of ensuing our image shots are current. Once the system was put in

place, and staff/freelance journalists told to use this as the housing and reference point for

product image across print, digital and online.

The DAM has prevented versioning issues, saving turnaround time on design, promotion on

social media and publishing.

all_reviews.review_title: Outstanding product and customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The default installation of an IntelligenceBank system is very intuitive and provides an outstanding platform for a company to build from. This has allowed me to think of additional uses for the platform above and beyond what we originally signed up for.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
It saddens me that it took me so long to discover IntelligenceBank. My only other non-positive--I refuse to call this a negative--is the current lack of a tag cloud style feature that would allow members to search more easily for existing tags before adding their own to any new image upload.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Absolutely try the demo of IntelligenceBank and do not be afraid to ask questions specific to your own companies needs.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were suffering from a lack of data centralisation and were therefore dealing with multiple instances of the same files (many of which had been edited). Another linked issue was a lack of connection between images and consent forms. Through related documents in IntelligenceBank, this has been resolved.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I want our staff to take responsibility for the Web2Print collateral they're producing so require them to approve the proof prior to completing it. When moving files I don't want to be taken to the new destination file, I want to stay in the folder I'm moving files away from - this should be a Settings option I can set.

We needed a solution for external agencies and staff to be able to use for accessing the latest versions of collateral and information.

all_reviews.review_title: Perfect Match
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
IntelligenceBank is SaaS, has well integrated workflow along with a solid asset management system. What really sets IB apart is their service. They work from the customer perspective, molding their product to fit the customer rather than steering the customer to adapt the the product.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Nothing to dislike. We're fairly early into the implementation, but IB has been there whenever we hit something we need help with.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Identifying and prioritizing your specific requirements, and your support/management needs and abilities is absolutely critical. Take your time. Don't move forward until you are sure you know what you need to make your implementation a success.

Get input from all key stakeholders and require proof (demos) from potential vendors before making a decision.

Implement in phases so you can refine before you expand your features and audiences.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
Support creation, management and distribution of approved, consistent and measured content. Remove asset locating and distribution responsibility from Creative and Marketing teams. Benefits have yet to be realized as we continue to implement and refine. That said, it is already obvious that the impact will be positive and significant.

They work from the customer perspective, molding their product to fit the customer rather than steering the customer to adapt the the product.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing to dislike. We're fairly early into the implementation, but IB has been there whenever we hit something we need help with.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
review_question_answers.answer:
Identifying and prioritizing your specific requirements, and your support/management needs and abilities is absolutely critical. Take your time. Don't move forward until you are sure you know what you need to make your implementation a success.

Get input from all key stakeholders and require proof (demos) from potential vendors before making a decision.

Implement in phases so you can refine before you expand your features and audiences.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Support creation, management and distribution of approved, consistent and measured content. Remove asset locating and distribution responsibility from Creative and Marketing teams. Benefits have yet to be realized as we continue to implement and refine. That said, it is already obvious that the impact will be positive and significant.

all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank made us more efficient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
It has made us much more efficient! The simplicity of uploading assets and tagging them for sharing across a wide network of stakeholders is terrific. We had no previous way of sharing photography and marketing collateral across representatives from eight organisations - all of whom have varying understandings of technology and usage of assets.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I'm yet to come across something I don't like. Perhaps if we were to throw the doors open to the media to access our content too we would find that too many licenses would  cost us a lot but we haven't got there yet.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Talk through your requirements with the guys at IntelligenceBank. They were great in assessing our needs and answering our questions before we took the plunge.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is saving us time, making us more efficient
It is improving quality control across our nine related but independent organisations

all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank DAM Helps Us Achieve Brand Consistency
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
NAB is a big organisation, with users around the country and Asia Pacific.  IntelligenceBank helps us showcase our brand guidelines, makes it easy to download our brand assets and truly explain our brand to our internal stakeholders and external agency partners.  The software is extremely customisable and I like how our "BrandHub" looks like our brand.  The account management staff are very responsive - there is nothing that's too hard and they always come up with cost effective solutions to any custom requirements we may have.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
There's nothing I don't like about it.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Before you implement a BrandHub, make sure you understand your audience, and know which types of content each segment both wants and needs to consume.  That is - everyone needs something different, and your navigation structure needs to reflect this.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a very complex brand, and needed a flexible solution to be able to visually explain our brand guidelines.  IntelligenceBank was the perfect technology for our needs

Trevor Peter is responsible for organizing and designing custom print materials for Carlsberg.  As markets and brands under the Carlsberg umbrella vary, there are a large number of custom requests that come in for various marketing materials.  The IntelligenceBank team has been very responsive to our custom requirements and has worked with our stakeholders to ensure a successful program.

This has added efficiency in our process and allowed us a record and audit trail for materials. IntelligenceBank has yet to leave a problem unsolved and has provided us with multiple options to support any user issues.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
With a geographically dispersed mobile group of users, we are able to leverage IntelligenceBank to gather information and deliver materials in an efficient manner.

The ability to share our assets with partners and suppliers; also it's quick and easy to find what you're looking for.

all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank helps keep US on top of our digital assets.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
Was incredibly easy to sign-up and get started using the software within our processes.
Managing the life-cycle of our assets is vital, and that function is really simple and straightforward.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Probably a lot more functionality available and in view than we need being a single office so would be good if we could have some quick links to our top 3 or 4 used functions.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Even if you are small (like us) or a large organization, I recommend firstly, really understanding your needs - or even discuss these with a consultant. Mainly as the great thing about IntelligenceBank is how easy it is to customize to your needs, and the trial was enough for our 'training'.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a huge amount of images and reports to manage, so keeping on top of the asset life-cycle has been hard for us to manually manage given the turn-around time on some sales or versions. A simple to use and simple to set-up Digital Asset Management system was our brief.

all_reviews.review_title: No oversights here! - End-to-end contract information management.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
We have been able to easily set-up workflows from with in the platform, which assists us in monitoring our proposals through to contracts. We are also able to link related materials, which is ideal for our purpose. For our non-frequent users, who are often trying to reference some client or contract details on the fly, for example, the meta-data and search function is smooth and responsive.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Some very small usability aspects, such as sometimes an action button placement changes from where you expect it to be based on other pages.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Certainly the trial. We are probably an uncommon use case and through the trial we were able to assess if the functionality would fit.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use the platform to basically manage our end-to-end contract process to ensure all key information and any visuals, especially those included in our proposals, are applicable and current. This also applies to housing client paperwork and monitoring contract currency or review dates. Using this system has meant we are no longer responding last minute or discovering oversights to client focused aspects of our business.

all_reviews.review_title: NAB uses Brand Hub
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
The People. Intelligence Bank is about People, they just happen to provide a SAAS product. They work to understand what you're trying to achieve and what they can do on their end to make that happen. Truly collaborative.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Techie talk, because it isn't my forte. This language is slowly being phased out and replaced with talk about how it improves the user experience or supports the Brand team.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
Start the dialogue with the IB team as you're defining your strategy, not afterwards - it's best to understand from the outset what can be achieve straight out of the box, and what might need to be customised.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
NAB has hundreds of Marketers and hundreds of suppliers that all need access to our Brand tools to be able to create work for us. Although this function is very administrative and low-value, it's of the highest business need to ensure the right people (only) have access to what they need to help us go to market.

all_reviews.review_title: A DAM that Saves Me Serious Time
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
I like how you can really customize the interface.  Not only can I store everything in one place, but I can flick client proposals out to customers pretty easily without having to get them to login.  The support is pretty good too and I can brand my portal with my company colours, logos and fonts.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
I'm very happy with the service.  Sometimes uploading is slow but usually it's ok.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
If you need to manage thousands proposals and images, get a system custom built for managing images.  Share drives and other free services don't really cut it.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used to use Dropbox for my proposals and images but it was kind of messy. IntelligenceBank got the structure right for me and now it has saved me lots of time.  The keyword management is much better than anything else.  It was worth spending money on a system, than relying on something that was free -but just not 100% right.

all_reviews.review_title: More than a DAM - Product Image and Marketing Repository
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
Awesome UX, customizable interface, mobile friendly and super easy to use. I like the fact that within the DAM there is a database where I can keep records of all my products and link them to the product files.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Some of the new features like web to print are kind of expensive. I'd like to use more features but we don't have the budget.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
There are a lot of DAM providers that look the same. Some have some additional features that may be useful.  Finding out about IntelligenceBank's databases was a huge surprise and it ended up saving us $$$.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed a go-to place for all of our product information, images, fact sheets and specs. Having everything in one place is important to us and keeping track of versions saves us lots of time. Also, some of our product files are huge Tiffs - so being able to send links to the files to our partners, instead of using another service has been great.

all_reviews.review_title: A great Digital Asset Management that helps to showcase products
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
My staff don't need training and the upgrades are free.
The price is great and their version control, as well as slideshow view of images are fantastic.
It's also mobile friendly.
I also like the reporting, which allows me to see when my files have been viewed by customers.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
No Android app. We use the iPad app for offline access to our documents and images but some of our team have android.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
While you can probably set it up all yourself, it's worth having the IntelligenceBank team upload all of your images for you. Saves time and doesn't cost much. It's also worth asking IntelligenceBank about their client use cases as they have a lot of great ideas on how to make the most out of their solution.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We sell marble, granite and limestone kitchens. I need to have actual client examples of what our products look like once implemented. By having all of our case studies, product images and final fit outs in our digital asset management, it's easy to share with our prospective clients. I can just send them a link to big files without them needing to login and report on when the files have been viewed and by whom. It's also instant to share the latest files with my team. all_reviews.review_title: IntelligenceBank DAM is effortless to use and makes sharing files simple!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
Tout Creative is a Graphic Design agency. We use IntelligenceBank Marketing to store and share art work. We also store and share brand guidelines with our clients. It makes our job easier as we can use workflow approvals to keep track of revisions. Everything is easily accessible as its all in one place.

Client & contractors can access files directly without our help. We have noticed a 50% decrease in file requests - this saves us a lot of time! IntelligenceBank Marketing even assisted us in winning a new client. Our new client loved that we could provide brand and creative approval processes.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Our clients would like the ability to do advanced image cropping within IntelligenceBank. We suggested it to IntelligenceBank, and they advised this feature is coming out in the next few days.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
We love the ability to easily brand our portal with our own branding. IntelligenceBank is easy to use and the support is outstanding. We also love metadata embedding. This is when metadata is entered into IntelligenceBank and stays with the files, even after they have downloaded.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
IntelligenceBank improves collaboration. Our external client portal  allows for self service, which provides significant time saving.

IntelligenceBank's DAM is nicely designed and super easy for everyone on our team to use - including people who are not native English speakers or design savvy. It's really easy to navigate, you can log on and jump straight in to using it, you don't need lengthy instruction workshops. The IntelligenceBank support team are very responsive, so if you do get stuck they are right there to assist.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
So far there is nothing to dislike, certain nothing with the system or the service received from IntelligenceBank..

We are a regional airline with offices throughout Asia Pacific.  Our biggest challenge has been to share creative work across different offices, and also to educate our team on how to communicate our brand.  IntelligenceBank has customisable brand pages which help us educate and collaborate on our brand.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Use and Super Helpful Support Staff
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
Just how flexible and easy to use the system is. It has all the great features & functionality of more expensive DAMs without overwhelming users or administrators.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Like all DAMs, managing permissions can get a bit confusing. Intelligence Bank make it seamless enough, and they have great on-boarding and resources to help review your setup. If you're organising a very large team/organisation, it might be worth getting a helping hand from their always-on-hand customer support team.

Recommendations to others considering IntelligenceBank:
There are DAMs out there that cost a lot of money but have all sorts of whizz bang features. For us, IntelligenceBank had all the bells and whistles we needed, plus ones we didn't know we needed, at a very reasonable price. The training we received to set up the system, for our admins, was great and well-delivered. We received some more direct assistance setting us some of the more complex requirements we had, and this was done quickly and without fuss. Highly recommend IntelligenceBank and the team who help make the transition a smooth and easy process.

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We scoped a whole range of DAMs looking for a user-friendly, affordable and effective solution to help us collaborate on content creation internationally. We also wanted a system so easy to use that people stopped storing assets elsewhere, anywhere. It has provided us with a go-to place for all things marketing communications and helps us manage an effective and robust client consent policy.

all_reviews.review_title: From fashion shoot to future planning
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about IntelligenceBank?
-       We love that we can make the design of the software look and feel like it's ours!

-       Managing the permissions, access and external sharing and so on is thankfully not complicated at all -  as we use these aspects a lot.

-       We use and link to the inbuilt calendar for campaign planning - which surprisingly was not one of features we listed as a must have.

What do you dislike about IntelligenceBank?
Not really that major, but the bulk uploader (which we use a fair bit - for sometimes up to 50/60 files) shows selected files as thumbnail sized icons in list format. This means a lot of scrolling down to visually confirm files and save. (Perhaps a grid?).

What problems is IntelligenceBank solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are an online fashion retailer. We do all our own photo-shoots, online comms and marketing in-house, so our DAM is pretty much integral to our processes. It really does help us manage the use of our assets, which until the IB-DAM was mayhem.
It was easy for us to have a good look around the platform in the trial, but even better was when the sales guy showed us some great examples of custom branded platforms, we could really visualize ours after that (he had some good use tips too - especially on meta-data).
